headline: Robinhood continues rally ahead of S&P 500 rebalance
summary: Shares of Robinhood (HOOD) are trading up again on Friday ahead of tonight’s S&P 500 rebalance, marking the sixth consecutive day of outperformance for the stock. Earlier this week, BofA had pointed out that it saw Robinhood as “a prime candidate” to join the S&P 500. This is not the first time a Wall Street firm has named Robinhood as a potential pick. For the March rebalance, Barclays had already included Robinhood in its list of likely candidates for inclusion in the S&P 500. PRIME CANDIDATE:
